Description:
THE TREE CHANGE YOU HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR WITH THE LOCATION AND LIFESTYLE
Set amongst the beautiful forestry of the Dandenong Ranges is this established four bedroom home, awaiting it new owners to enjoy.
The residence has been freshly painted throughout and will not disappoint with the Master bedroom featuring a his and her double BIR, ensuite with oversized shower and its own private garden courtyard, making it the perfect place for your morning coffee with the birds.
Bedrooms 2,3 and 4 are located to the rear of the home and all feature their own hydronic heating units plus beds 2 and 4 feature double built n robes.
The newly renovated kitchen includes electric oven, gas cook-top, dishwasher and overlooks the open plan family and dining area which is bright and airy making it the perfect place for the family to congregate.
The formal living features a gas fireplace and is set at the front of the house which means there is an abundance of space for the whole family to enjoy.
Outside is where you will find the spacious undercover entertaining area with the forest surroundings at your feet plus an abundance of space 1 ¼ acres (approx) for the kids to play and enjoy.
There is a double carport, workman's shed with shelving, work bench and power, an open storage area off the carport along with an exceptional amount of off street parking.
The property is 2 minutes' drive to the Cockatoo Township, close to the local Primary School, Wright Forrest and public transport but the privacy & tranquillity makes it seem miles away from everything.
Insights: 18 Glen Road, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2020 and 20 other 4 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Amongst the Trees On 1/3 Acre!
Here is a great opportunity to purchase a private 1/3 (approx.) acre block to build your new home on (STCA)!
This block has all the beauty that nature has to offer in a quite location, yet still close to schools, bus stop, shops & sporting facilities & with the added bonus of sealed road access.
If building your own home is your dream, don't let this block pass you by!
Call Mick Dolphin on 0429684522 or Amie Colbert on 0413 160 413 or Meaghan Dolphin on 0422 578 114 to arrange your inspection today!

Description:
Light, Bright & Spacious On 1/2 An Acre
Set on a beautifully landscaped allotment of 1/2 an acre with stunning landscaped native gardens, offering peace and privacy is this gorgeous mud brick home that has plenty of character and all the modern conveniences you could want in a home.
You would expect to see a home like this in a country lifestyle magazine. This bespoke home has been thoughtfully designed around a modern family lifestyle and offers a meals area, formal lounge plus an open plan lounge room that is overlooked by the handcrafted kitchen which is located in the heart of the home and features granite bench tops, Tasmanian Oak doors with pressed-metal panels, a large central island bench constructed on recycled power poles, huge walk-in pantry and stainless steel appliances. The kitchen leads out to a covered alfresco providing a second meals area in the warmer months.
Also on offer are 3 spacious bedrooms, master with large fitted walk-in-robe/dressing room and ensuite featuring spa bath and separate toilet. All bedrooms have ample fitted-out built in robes.
Bedroom 3 with its stunning bay window has its own ensuite bathroom & is part of a separate wing complete with a spacious living room with its own entrance and beautiful spotted gum parquetry flooring. This can remain an integral part of the house or be closed off making it ideal as semi self-contained accommodation or home office with independent access, or possible conversion into a 4th bedroom. There are also 2 more quality bathrooms and walk through study.
There are many special features that include sandstone floor tiles, leadlight feature windows and doors, plenty of storage, huge fitted laundry with built in ironing system, ducted gas central heating, continuous flow temperature controlled hot water system, top of the range security doors and window security throughout, two slow combustion heaters, feature celestial windows highlight the vaulted ceilings which combine perfectly with a northerly aspect to ensure that the home is bathed in natural light all year round making it energy efficient while also bringing the outside in.
Outside there is a split level timber deck with both open and undercover areas accessed through French doors to all adjoining rooms and overlooking a sandstone paved BBQ area, complete with striking bespoke wrought iron balustrade.
Completing the whole package is ample car parking with room for trailer or boat, a separate carport, garage/workshop, wood storage and a garden shed. All this with dual road footage, this is a home that truly needs to be appreciated so call today inspection is a must.
Due to strong market conditions please call before the open to confirm that it is still going ahead.
Insights: 8 Ferngully Road, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2016 and 38 other 3 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
Almost a Private Acre of Tranquility!
Situated on almost an acre is this attractive family home with bull verandah running the length giving it a country home appeal. Well located, beautifully presented and providing the space families need with the peace and privacy the hills are renowned for. Inside you'll find 4 bedrooms, 3 with triple robes, the Master with walk in robe and ensuite with spa bath. The bedrooms have a relaxing elevated outlook and welcome the morning sun. Add to this two large living areas which can be closed off if Mum and Dad need some quiet time, country style kitchen with stainless gas cooktop and 900mm oven, large walk in pantry and it overlooks the dining area and family room. From here the outdoor entertaining is accessed which is paved and completed with a built in wood oven, perfect for pizza nights with family and friends. For cars there's a double lock up garage and there is plenty of space for off street parking or turning circle. The gardens are natural with ample cleared areas to create the garden of your dreams, as well as having a great chook shed and garden shed. Other features include hardwood floors, mains water and gas, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, under house storage. Homes of this size and quality are highly sought after, avoid disappointment book your private inspection today.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Grant Day 0417 565 745 or Bethany Day 0438 844 968

Description:
Private Location, 3 Beds Plus A Study!
Set in a private and peaceful location and surrounded by colourful gardens & established trees is this character filled family home boasting 3 bedrooms plus study. Beautifully presented inside and out you will be delighted upon inspection to find ducted heating, an enormous modern kitchen with island bench, slate flooring, leadlight features and of course the convenience of 2 bathrooms. Outside you will enjoy a huge fully fenced back yard, a private covered outdoor entertaining area, sealed driveway plus there is a large double steel garage which is perfect for the home handyman. A short stroll to the local township, schools and sporting facilities ensures you will love every moment in your new home. Arrange your inspection now!?
Due to strong market conditions please call before the open to confirm that it is still going ahead.

Description:
Cockatoo's Secret!
Rainy Hill Road is a secret to the locals who live there. Under 10 minutes drive from Emerald and a few minutes to Cockatoo Township, it is close to all conveniences but retains a country feel with many properties in the street on large acreage. If you're looking for a quiet peaceful place to settle this is it! On offer is just over 2 acres, approximately half cleared, as well as an old 1 bedroom cottage with double carport and shed which could make a great Man cave or maybe somewhere for you to live while you build your dream home (STCA). The Cottage has mains water, a wood heater for warmth and a split system for comfort in the warmer months. This is a lovely quiet peaceful block of land and will not last long.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Peace And Privacy In The Perfect Location
At the top of a quiet street this cosy and comfortable home with a northerly aspect has so much to offer. Situated on a useable 830m2 (approx) allotment the home boasts 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, a well located kitchen with views to the backyard and a fantastic open plan lounge and dining area with an updated bathroom. Whether it is for a first home, investment or downsize so there is simply nothing to do but enjoy this relaxing and comfortable home. Special features include gas ducted heating throughout and split system for cooling and 3kW solar system. The front and back deck are ideal to enjoy the peace and quiet, plus the private fully fenced rear yard is large enough but not too big as to be a lot of maintenance. Immaculately kept inside and out with single carport with rear yard access possible, this is the perfect opportunity.
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429684522 or Amie Colbert on 0413 160 413 or Meaghan Dolphin on 0422 578 114 to arrange your inspection today!

Description:
Well Over an Acre & Walk to Town!
Land of this size and quality with such a comfortable family home is rare so close to town; but here it is! Over 1.25 acres with a fantastic family home, pony paddock, arena and in ground pool - this property has it all! The solid brick home with bull nose, wrap around verandah has spacious proportions and offers 4 bedrooms with built in robes, the Master at one end of the home with walk in robe and ensuite. For family living and entertaining there's a spacious lounge with ambient open fire as well as a split system for comfort year round, a family room with cosy wood heater as well as mains gas ducted heating throughout for convenience and there is also a separate study or formal dining room. The country kitchen has ample storage with large pantry, new bench tops, gas cooktop and dishwasher and overlooks the meals area as well as having views to the rear yard to keep an eye on the little ones. Features include new timber flooring, fresh paint throughout the living areas and all mains services are connected. Outside the property is fully fenced and there is heaps of shedding for workshop, storage etc, including a stable and cubby for the kids, the in ground pool for fun summer days and of course the pony paddock. Add to this a sealed driveway and 4 car carport and every box is ticked!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
When Size, Comfort & Location Matter!
Don't miss this opportunity to purchase this beautifully renovated and styled large family home perfectly positioned just metres from Cockatoos shops, schools and transport. Set on quarter of an acre, the home is elevated and sits behind a picket fence with a large double carport in the front. The homes exterior has been recently refurbished in vinyl wrap, (a fantastic low maintenance finish) with wide decking all around. Step inside and you'll be pleasantly surprised with the space and airy light feel. From the sunken lounge you'll find the bedroom wing with 3 bedrooms with built in robes, one being suitable as a guest room with its own ensuite bathroom (as well as a family bathroom). The kitchen and large meals area are light and bright and have a lovely country feel with new bench tops, new stainless dishwasher and range hood. Add to this a large walk in pantry and its the hostesses dream. From here you access the second living area with access to the Master bedroom with built in robes, ensuite and parent's retreat area. Features include mains gas ducted heating, 2 split system cooling units, beautiful polished floors and handy under stair storage. For outdoor entertaining you have two options of decked areas as well as a paved area, and for storage there's a garden shed/workshop with concrete floor. The garden is fully fenced, private and with pretty cottage planting and lots of space for the kids to have a trampoline and run around in safety.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Character Home in Good Location!
First home buyers or downsizers this is a must see. This home has a country cabin look but has been tastefully renovated throughout giving the interior almost a beachy feel with white painted timber and log paneling yet the pitched timber ceilings remain unpainted for the warm country feel. The home has 3 bedrooms all with new carpet and freshly painted, new bathroom, family room and beautiful new kitchen with stainless dishwasher and gas cooktop and a clever island bench which can be moved if necessary. Other features include a toasty wood heater as well split system cooling and new quality window furnishings. Outside the wrap around verandah has been refurbished and at the rear is the perfect spot to take in the lush vista of your private oasis. Homes in this price range of such quality are rare and inspection will not disappoint.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Grant Day 0417 565 745 or Bethany Day 0438 844 968

Description:
5 Bedroom Family Home on Half an Acre!
Immaculately presented this home has more than enough room both inside and out. Located on scenic Paternoster Road the home features 5 bedrooms all with built in robes, study, 2 bathrooms (ensuite to master), 2 separate living areas and separate dining, not to mention the alfresco dining area on one of the 2 verandas. Polished timber floors feature throughout, the modern kitchen comes equipped with gas cooking and dishwasher. Gas ducted and slow combustion heating plus air conditioning and ceiling fans will keep you comfortable all year round. A separate external spa room overlooks sweeping manicured lawns and established gardens that incorporate a generous double car garage, single car or caravan accommodation plus great sized storage shed. What more could anyone want?
Insights: 9 Paternoster Road, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2016 and 7 other 5 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
Solid Starter in Good Location!
This is the perfect opportunity for 1st home buyers or astute investors to buy into the popular Hills town of Cockatoo with views to the mountains and within walking distance to shops, schools and transport. The home offers 3 good sized bedrooms with polished floors, open plan lounge and dining with parquetry floors, wood heater and air-conditioning, kitchen with dishwasher and gas cooktop, family bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. For entertaining there is a large elevated rear deck with views to the mountains and overlooking the fenced rear yard, perfect for spending weekends relaxing with family and friends. The gardens are established with rose beds and vegie garden; they just need a little TLC to have them looking their best. Add to this a garden shed with concrete floor, a further shed for storage, mains gas, mains water and a single carport out the front and the picture is complete. Properties in this price range sell fast so call us today.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Don't Let This Pass You By!
Located in a quiet and leafy location of Cockatoo is this quaint character cottage, perfect for 1st home buyers or investors. The home offers three bedrooms, great open plan living, light and bright country kitchen and family bathroom. Extra features are polished floor boards throughout and gas wall furnace. Step outside to a great entertaining deck that overlooks a family friendly rear yard featuring a good-sized veggie patch, chicken coop, kid’s cubby and under house storage. Be quick for this one!!

Description:
Attention First Home Buyers & Investors!
What a perfect, solid entry for the first home buyer or investor looking to purchase in a convenient location, just a short walk to the Primary School, public transport & Cockatoo Central. This home has loads of potential yet is still comfortable enough to move straight in and being brick means well insulated and low maintenance for the years to come. It even comes with the benefit of a new roof with insulation. The home is situated on quarter of an acre and features 3 bedrooms, the Master with robes and entry to the bathroom creating an ensuite effect. There's a large lounge with a large gas wood heater for convenience, a great sized dining area or second living with a split system for comfort, kitchen with gas cooktop and ample storage, laundry and separate toilet. Outside you have a lovely terraced rear yard, the perfect place to relax and take in the sun and it is fully fenced for the safety of children or your furry friends. Add to this mains gas, water & sewer connected an asphalt driveway and established gardens which provide absolute privacy. Properties in this price range don't last long so be quick!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Resort Style Living with Dual Accommodation Potential!
With more than meets the eye this well located home is situated on a sealed road between Cockatoo and Emeralds facilities - ideal for the family and ideal for entertaining. Privately positioned on a flat and useable 2.5 acres this character home has to be seen to be truly appreciated. Situated over two levels and spread over two wings, the home features 6 bedrooms plus study including an oversized master with walk in robe & modern ensuite with double shower, formal lounge, large country style kitchen with dishwasher and central breakfast bar, meals area, family room and rumpus room with wet bar. The home also consists of 4 bathrooms strategically located on both levels. Special features include gas ducted heating (2 units), polished floorboards, gas heater and ample storage. Parking is no problem with a double garage and plenty of open space. Entertain family & friends in style with a huge alfresco area, outdoor barbeque or take a splash in the solar heated pool with spa. Outside there is plenty to enjoy with flat lawn areas for the kids, established gardens, play equipment for the kids, bird aviary, workshop and pathways meandering around the grounds. Just like your own piece of paradise!
The list of extras is endless, come & see for yourself!
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429684522 or Amie Colbert on 0413 160 413 or Meaghan Dolphin on 0422 578 114 to arrange your inspection today!
Due to strong market conditions please call before the open to confirm that the property is still available for sale.
Insights: 266 Woori Yallock, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
1.2 Acres (approx.) of Peace and Privacy in the Heart of Cockatoo
Set well back off the road and only a short distance to central Cockatoo, this home offers a great opportunity to set yourself up for life. Privately positioned yet close to all facilities including schools and transport, this home stretches itself across 4725m2 of flat and usable land. The home consists of 3 robed bedrooms including master with ensuite and walk in robe, study, central living area and lovely timber kitchen with dishwasher. Outside boasts a studio or ‘mancave’ with 2 separate rooms. Enjoy summer evenings on the back verandah taking in the serenity. Additional features of this property include glass house, 3 garden sheds, wood heater and wall heating. Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522, Meaghan Dolphin on 0422 578 114 or Amie Colbert on 0413 160 413 to arrange your inspection now. Due to strong market conditions please call before the open to confirm that it is still going ahead.
